Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 4:24 PM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About smartphone displaySmartphone display is the thick/thin electronic display screen made up of glass, plastic, or other flexible substrates. These screens are lightweight and foldable. As the demand for user-friendly and ubiquitous displays is expected to increase, many industry participants are working toward the development of large and high-resolution displays for smartphones. Such displays make the screen of these devices durable and resistant to damage and increase the amount of content that can be displayed. In the future, it is possible that out of the rigid and flexible displays, the latter will be an embedded part of a wide range of applications. Technavio's analysts forecast the revenue of the global smartphone display market to grow at a CAGR of 7.9% in terms of revenue during 2014-2019. Covered in this Report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global smartphone display market for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, it considers the total revenue generated from the shipments of smartphone with the following display technologies:- LCD- OLED- Flexible displayThe report also covers the segmentation based on technology and resolution along with the key leading (revenue generating) countries.Technavio's report, Global Smartphone Display Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts.
